Note module¶

class Note.Note(note=None, vel=100, length=None, length_mod=None, prob=1, scale=None, accented=False)¶

Bases: object

Default constructor for Note. Assigns random pitch and length if not specified.

Parameters

  • note – MIDI note value

  • vel (int) – Velocity of note

  • length (float) – Length of note

  • length_mod (float) – Rhythm modifier (dotted, triplet, etc.)

  • prob – Probability that note is triggered

  • scale (Scale) – Scale to choose random notes from

Returns

Returns a Note object

Return type

Note

static copy_note(note)¶

Static copy constructor for Note.

Parameters

note (Note) – Note object to copy

Returns

Returns a Note object, copy of note

Return type

Note

get_note()¶

Utility function to get note midi value.

Returns

Returns Note midi value

Return type

int

mutate(scale, custom_len_list=None, custom_len_mod_list=None, prob=1, threshold=0.5)¶

Class method to mutate note and rhythm values of Note.

Parameters

  • scale (scale) – Scale object to pick random note from

  • prob (float) – Probability that Note is mutated

  • custom_len_list (List of floats) – Optional list of custom length values

  • custom_len_mod_list (Dict of floats) – Optional list of custom length modifier values

Returns

No return, modifys existing object

Return type

None

mutate_length(custom_len_list=None, prob=1, threshold=0.5)¶

Class method to mutate length value of Note.

Parameters

  • custom_len_list (List of floats) – Optional list of custom length values

  • prob (float) – Probability that Note is mutated

  • threshold (float) – Determines whether length is mutated more up or down

Returns

No return, modifys existing object

Return type

None

Class method to mutate length mod value of Note using

rand_length_mod.

Parameters

  • custom_len_mod_list (Dict of floats) – Optional list of custom length modifier values

Returns

mutate_note(scale, prob=1, threshold=0.5)¶

Class method to mutate note value of Note.

Parameters

  • scale (Scale) – Scale object to pick random note from

  • prob (float) – Probability that Note is mutated

  • threshold (float) – Probability of mutating note up or down

Returns

rand(scale, custom_len_list=None, custom_len_mod_list=None, prob=1)¶

Class method to randomize note and rhythm values of Note.

Parameters

  • scale (Scale) – Scale object to pick random note from

  • custom_len_list (List of floats) – Optional list of custom length values

  • custom_len_mod_list (Dict of floats) – Optional list of custom length modifier values

  • prob (float) – Probability that note is randomized

Returns

No return, modifys existing object

None

rand_note(scale=None, prob=1)¶

Method to get random note.

Parameters

  • scale (Scale) – Optional scale to choose random note from

  • threshold (float) – Threshold for sharps (0) vs flats (1)

  • prob (floats) – Probability that note is randomized

Returns

No return, modifys existing object

Return type

None
